cast.name: 约瑟芬·约伯特 Joséphine Jobert
伊丽莎白·贝林顿 Elizabeth Berrington
丹尼·约翰-儒勒 Danny John-Jules

director.name: 乔纳森戈什菲尔德 Jonathan Gershfield
斯图尔特·斯瓦桑 Stewart Svaasand

trans_title: 天堂岛疑云 第七季
introduction: Jack Mooney is starting to settle in the sun-soaked island of Saint-Marie, and he has some impossible mysteries to solve. A champion poker player, apparently poisoned at the table in front of an astonished audience. A novelist, murdered in a plot more surprising than anything he’s ever written. And a spiritual leader, strangled at a time when all the suspects were each other’s alibis. Jack’s laconic style belies a sharp mind and relentless determination. He’s a brilliant detective, and he’ll need all his instinctive genius to solve these perplexing murders.
chinese_title: 天堂岛疑云 第七季
